description.lang: BL1000HW is the service gateway device to provide the KDDI's FTTH service.So this can be used only in KDDI's network.This also has the following featuresWireless router technology Number of USB PortsUSB3.01 portNumber of Ether port : 1Gbps3port type RJ45Dial-up port 1port type RJ11When you use this device as the Z-Wave gateway, you have to subscribe the KDDI's FTTH service and optional service.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline; A NOTIFICATION frame is sent to the nodes in this association group when a Lifeline event occurs.
